channel.title: Why does this happen every time?!?!
channel.description: everytime i try to play moparscape 3.2 with arayan it says that the server is down no matter which server i go to even my own. please someone help.

item.title: Why does this happen every time?!?!
item.dc:creator: @newyorkowns newyorkowns
item.description:
@newyorkowns wrote:

yeah go to control panel then go to security senter then windows firewall and turn it off if that doesnt work uninstall moparscape and install it again.

Read full topic
item.source: Why does this happen every time?!?!

item.title: Why does this happen every time?!?!

Well Your firewall may be blocking them, it happened to me once
